text: Let F be an AX-consistent subset of formulas in L. We construct a sequence of AX-consistent sets Fo, F1, Fo, .. .. L is a countable language, we can enumerate its formulas: P12, ... We define: Fo:=F oy F; U{t;y1} if this set is AX-consistent A otherwise Each set in the sequence Fg, Fi, ... is AX-consistent. F; is a nondecreasing sequence of sets.
